name: @neondatabase/serverless
author: Neon
description: node-postgres for serverless environments from neon.tech

scripts.preversion: ([[ $(git branch --show-current) = 'main' ]] || echo 'Must be on `main`') && git pull && npm run format && npm run test
scripts.version: (grep $npm_package_version CHANGELOG.md || 'Update CHANGELOG.md') && git checkout -b release/v$npm_package_version && jq --arg v $npm_package_version '.version = $v' jsr.json > build/jsr.json && mv build/jsr.json jsr.json && git add jsr.json index.js index.d.ts index.mjs index.d.mts
scripts.postversion: git push --follow-tags origin release/v$npm_package_version && echo 'Release $npm_package_version created. Run `npm publish` once PR is merged into `main`.'
scripts.test: touch src && npm run test:node && npm run test:edge && npm run test:bun && npm run test:deno && npm run test:packages && npm run test:cloudflare && npm run test:vercel && npm run test:browser
scripts.test:bun: npm run build && bun run --env-file=.env.test tests/basic/basic.ts
scripts.test:deno: npm run build && deno run --env-file=.env.test --allow-all tests/basic/basic.ts
scripts.test:browser: npm run build && playwright install --with-deps firefox chromium && vitest run --dir=tests/browser --browser --config=tests/browser/vite.config.mts
